summary.span: Contiene clases que admiten la interoperación entre los controles de Windows Forms y WPF.

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El espacio de nombres contiene clases que permiten la interoperación entre el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] y [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] tecnologías.The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. Cuando usas clases, puede hospedar [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] a los controles de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] páginas, y [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elementos en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-aplicaciones basadas en.When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. Las dos clases claves que implementan las capacidades de interoperación son y .The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . La clase usada depende de la implementación del control:Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - Utilice la clase cuando se debe usar un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control en un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] página.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - Utilice la clase cuando se debe usar un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento en un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-aplicación basada en.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
